typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		components_id as string,
		components_name as string,
		components_isDeprecated as string,
		components_type as string,
		dependencies as (type as string, name as string, version as string)[],
		product_id as string,
		product_name as string,
		{authoritative-branch} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	limit: 10,
	singleDocument: true) ~> source1
source(output(
		product as (id as string, Name as string),
		components as (id as string, name as string, isDeprecated as string, type as string, dependencies as (type as string, name as string, version as string)[])[],
		{authoritative-branch} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> source2
source1 filter(ERROR_FUNCTION('')) ~> Filter1
